'''Fate's Yearning Perfume''' is a perfume made by [[Ying'er]] during the Liyue Archon Quest "[[Three Poignant Perfumes]]". Ying'er says it has a gentle but lingering fragrance, something something like the dusk mist, and it's a favorite of mature ladies.
